"A.P.238/4/2": "Hm? About the past? You want to hear about when Dark Falz first appeared?"
"I can tell you a little of what I learned about it..."
"...Ah, damn it. I was never very good at studying."
"I don't know if I remember everything, if that's OK."
"As far as I can recall, Dark Falz's name popped up twice."
"There was a war 40 years ago, and the incident 10 years ago."
"40 years ago. That's when they said Dark Falz [Elder] was defeated."
"Well, I guess it turned out to be sealed, rather than defeated."
"The main three members at that time became the Three Heroes."
"The Three Heroes became the center of ARKS, rebuilding after the war left them devastated, that's how it went."
"Then 10 years ago. I remember that myself..."
"Dark Falz went on a large-scale offensive against ARKS."
"Uh... I think Dark Falz was repelled by the power of the second generation Claris Claes."
"But she died where we stood, so the current Claris Claes is the third generation."
"Yeah, a lot of famous people died back then, it was such a tragedy."
"I wonder how many ships were destroyed in that battle..."
"Civillians were hurt too, not just ARKS."
"And my older sister disappeared..."
"Oh, sorry! I went off on a bit of a tangent!"
"Well, that's it. Sorry, there's a lot I don't remember."
"Looking back at it, we did a lot better this time."
"...It hurts that we lost people we knew."
"...Ah, hold on. Zeno hasn't been confirmed dead yet."
"Yeah, that's right. He's just missing. It's alright, it'll be alright!"
